resources.string: The "Simplified Jamb Cbt App" is an educational app whose sole aim is to help students prepare for thier UTME examination. Most of the necessary materials are included if not all.

We are a tech firm concerned with creating value with our products. The mission is to make readily available apps to help in several phases of development of a persons life. Educational apps, personal development apps and others. This is our own way of being involved in everyones growth with the values we create with our products.
